mapper.select: SELECT knowledge.id ,content ,title ,type_id ,kname ,publish_time ,summary ,key_word FROM knowledge LEFT JOIN knowledge_type ON knowledge.type_id = knowledge_type.id WHERE knowledge.id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge ( type_id, title, content ,summary,key_word) VALUES (#{knowledge.knowledgeType.id},#{knowledge.title}, #{knowledge.content}, #{knowledge.summary},#{knowledge.keyWord});
mapper.update: UPDATE knowledge SET type_id=#{knowledge.knowledgeType.id}, title=#{knowledge.title}, content=#{knowledge.content}, summary = #{knowledge.summary}, key_word=#{knowledge.keyWord} WHERE id=#{knowledge.id}
